text: Alupi Airstrip is a rural airstrip in Groot Henar serving the rice growing region southeast of Nieuw Nickerie, in the Nickerie District of Suriname. The airstrip is next to the Nickerie River. ==See also== * * *List of airports in Suriname *Transport in Suriname ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Alupi *Google Maps - Alupi Category:Airports in Suriname Category:Nickerie District
title: Alupi Airstrip
